body: ...Almost every fuckin tank,story,doujin someone shit out to this fuckin site is fucking NTRASH.What the fuck is wrong with you people? -- MEMBER OF ANTI-NTRASH MOVEMENT --
@The Real Dante I agree, it's very unfocused with too many characters, kinda like a long running manga somehow fused with hentai, I like plot in my doujins but not this kind.
This story is a little bit convoluted, the plotlines are all over the place.

Oo >> This version was already published 1 day ago (page 7) SO : Why did you share 3 or 4 times exactly the same version  .... Have you anyone to watch for that kind of mess ? I never could understand this.
da hell is this love triangle.. square shit
